subject: Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
Preakness Stakes
lead_paragraph: Shug McGaughey shipped his newly crowned Kentucky Derby champion, Orb, to his home base in New York to prepare for the May 18 Preakness Stakes.
snippet: Shug McGaughey shipped his newly crowned Kentucky Derby champion, Orb, to his home base in New York to prepare for the May 18 Preakness Stakes.
